page.title: 03FARMING LOCALLY
page.content: The main crops that are grown in our squares are{rape,winter wheat,winter {barley and beans.}The barley and wheat are both very easy to grow.The beans main bug,which comes on an easterly wind,is the black fly.Fields are sprayed at the first sign of the fly. The rape can be ruined by little black weevils laying their eggs inside the seed pod from which will come a little maggot which will ruin the seeds inside the pod. The tractors that are used to go through fields have small tyres so they do not break too many crops.Every other year the farmers will sow either barley or wheat to give their fields more fertile soil.Asmall number of cattle are kept and either fattened in barns or grazed on the less fertile hill slopes.
